title: JSON Filter
description: An event filter that filters keys out of events. Includes override excludes. This is useful to exclude information from events that is not needed by the rule engine

filter_type.description: The type of event filter (hidden field)

exclude_keys.description: A list of strings or patterns to remove. The values must be a full path in top-to-bottom order to the keys to be filtered

include_keys.description: A list of strings or patterns to keep even if it matches exclude_keys patterns. The values must be a full path in top-to-bottom order to the keys to be filtered
